name: Eg e fra Bergen
description:
"Eg e fra Bergen" ("I am from Bergen" in english) is a game about staying in the rain. The city named Bergen in Norway is (in)famous for it's rain, and the people who have a connection with Bergen feel at home in the rain. 

Move your character from left to right, catching raindrops from a small cloud to gain points. The goal is to get the most points before the time runs out! The game saves your high score in a .☔ file (yes, a dot emoji file) so you can always come back to it and try to beat the high score!
